# **We are Proud to Host Asia's Foremost Agricultural Exhibition**

We are exceptionally delighted to host what has actually become the Asia's leading agricultural technological exhibition. With time, we have now expanded from being a regional occasion to being considered as Asia's one of the biggest trade show. We have been exceptionally pleased to make available an almost an unequaled probability to view the most recent in addition to greatest trends in agricultural production. We work hard to be sure our programs proceeds keeps up while using the latest improvements along with the emerging demands of the industry.

India's farm Agricultural Trade show is Asia's major most recent technological show. Above 800 exhibitors and over 45, 000 companies attend every year originating from 55 nations. Displays prolong throughout the 102 acre park and also 1, 900, 000 sq.ft. of show room. This exhibit occurs on 10 to 12th of September, at the Mahatma Mandir in Gandhinagar, Gujarat, India. Asia's Farm Progress program is just one of the opened trade show event for the across the Oriental farmers based on the modern technology, equipment and also an exclusive area to those that make use of animals as an income source.

Agri Asia is surely an abroad farming exhibit event, which often functions as a system for connecting the space while using the current farming modern technologies to communicate with the professionals. This agriculture exhibition might also assist buyers along with sellers to understand their needs along with bring awareness in agricultural market to get a full time stake in agricultural farming.
